section.title: Introduction
section.para: This describes the 'poll' contribution. It provides functionality to quickly make a poll in MMBase. It supports IP-checking and cookie/session checking.

section.title: Installation
section.para: Placing mmbase-poll.jar in WEB-INF/lib suffices to provide the needed builders, and tags to fully customize your own poll. The component blocks are implementations using JSP so those JSP can be installed too..
Component blocks are only supported in MMBase versions beyond 1.8. The rest of the functionality also works with MMBase 1.8.
An editwizard task definition is available in the directory 'tasks'.

section.title: mm-pol tags
section.para: Using 'tag-files' a few tags are defined by the poll contribution. They are available by the following URL: xmlns:mm-poll="http://www.mmbase.org/tags/mm/poll"

section.title: mm-poll:vote tag
section.para: This tag explores the request, and handles a vote of a user. It has several attributes.

section.title: mm-poll:poll tag
section.para: This tag explores whether the client already voted, and then iterates over the possible answers. It has a 'canvote' attribute which is executed if the client can still vote, and the jsp:body is execute if it cannot vote for the poll.
This tag has a required attribute 'poll' to indicate about which poll it handles.

section.title: Component blocks
section.para: A complete poll implementation using the provided builders and tags is available as 'blocks' of the poll 'component'. The components generic admin pages of MMBase will give an overview of those block hence you have installed mmbase-poll.jar.

section.title: Builders
section.para: The poll component provides three builders.

section.title: Poll
section.para: The questions of the polls can be stored in here. Possible answers are posrel related nodes of the type 'answer'. The total number of given answers (so the sum of all 'total_answers' fields of the related answers, can be obtained by the function 'total'.
If the mmbase crontab module is active, then the field 'total' will be used to periodically store this total number of answers. This may be essential if e.g. you want to sort on this total.

section.title: Answer
section.para: Nodes of this type are posrel related to nodes of the type 'poll', to provide the possible options. There should be at least 2 anwers related to every poll.

section.title: IP
section.para: The ip builder can store the given answer for certain IP's. E.g. by using the mm-poll:checkip tag it can also be used more generally.
